definitions.definition: Someone possessing extraordinary intelligence or skill; especially somebody who has demonstrated this by a creative or original work in science, music, art etc.
definitions.example: I think that would qualify as not smart, but genius... and a very stable genius at that!

definitions.definition: Inspiration, a mental leap, an extraordinary creative process.
The tutelary deity or spirit of a place or person.
Ingenious, brilliant, very clever, or original.
